AT.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
AT.description: Nach seinem Erfolg mit King Kong erweckt der berühmte Videospiele-Designer Michel Ancel jetzt Rayman wieder zum Leben. Der putzige Held besitzt zwar immer noch keine Gliedmaßen, hat aber dank der innovativen Steuerung per Wii Remote ein paar coole neue Moves drauf. Raving Rabbids ist wohl das bisher verrückteste Rayman-Abenteuer. Unser unglückseliger Held wurde von einer durchgeknallten Hasen-Horde gefangen genommen, die Jahrhunderte lang im Untergrund ihr Unwesen trieb und nun die Weltherrschaft an sich reißen will. Um das Land und seine Bewohner zu retten, muss Rayman die Rabbids auf seine Seite bringen und den Plänen ihres wahnsinnigen Imperators ein Ende bereiten.

AU.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
AU.description: Fresh from his work on King Kong, acclaimed game designer Michel Ancel returns to revive Rayman. The eponymous icon is still lacking limbs, but has gained some funky new moves thanks to a control scheme built around the Wii’s innovative controls. Promising to be the zaniest Rayman adventure yet, Raving Rabbids sees our hapless hero imprisoned by a mad horde of bunnies that have been underground for centuries, plotting an invasion to take over the world. To save the land and its inhabitants, Rayman will need to get the Rabbids on his side and put an end to the plans of their crazy emperor.

BG.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
BG.description: Fresh from his work on King Kong, acclaimed game designer Michel Ancel returns to revive Rayman. The eponymous icon is still lacking limbs, but has gained some funky new moves thanks to a control scheme built around the Wii’s innovative controls. To save the land and its inhabitants, Rayman will need to get the Rabbids on his side and put an end to the plans of their crazy emperor.

BE.name: Rayman® contre les lapins crétins
BE.description: Juste après avoir achevé la réalisation de King Kong, le plus français des concepteurs de jeu revient pour redonner vie à Rayman, son enfant terrible. L’icône des jeux vidéo n'a toujours ni bras ni jambes mais il dispose maintenant de nouveaux mouvements fantaisistes grâce à un système de contrôle basé sur les commandes innovantes de la Wii. Sans doute la plus loufoque des aventures de Rayman à ce jour, Rayman Contre Les Lapins Crétins met en scène notre courageux héros prisonnier des griffes d'une horde de lapins ayant vécu secrètement pendant des siècles et espérant conquérir le monde. Pour sauver le monde et ses habitants, Rayman devra mettre les Lapins Crétins de son côté afin d'empêcher leur empereur maniaque de mettre ses terribles desseins à exécution.

ES.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
ES.description: Poco después de acabar su trabajo en King Kong, el aclamado diseñador de juegos Michel Ancel vuelve para revivir a Rayman. El popular personaje sigue sin tener brazos ni piernas, pero ahora, gracias a los innovadores controles de Wii, tiene unos movimientos nuevos muy originales. En Raving Rabbids, que promete ser la aventura más alocada de Rayman hasta la fecha, nuestro desafortunado héroe es encarcelado por una horda de conejitos chiflados que han vivido bajo tierra durante siglos, desarrollando un complot para invadir el mundo. Para salvar la tierra y a sus habitantes, Rayman tendrá que ir ganándose a los Rabbids y tendrá que poner fin a los planes de su loco emperador.

IT.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
IT.description: Reduce dal successo riscosso con King Kong, l'acclamato game designer Michel Ancel torna a dar vita a Rayman. Gli mancano ancora gli arti, ma ha guadagnato delle nuove mosse grazie allo schema di controllo costruito intorno ai comandi innovativi di Wii. Raving Rabbids promette di essere l'avventura Ryaman più entusiasmante di sempre e vede il nostro eroe intrappolato da un'orda di coniglietti che da secoli si nasconde nel sottosuolo ordendo un piano per invadere il mondo. Per salvare la Terra e i suoi abitanti, Rayman dovrà far passare i Rabbids dalla sua parte e mettere fine ai piani del loro folle imperatore.

NL.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
NL.description: Na zijn werk aan King Kong is de veelgeprezen spelontwikkelaar Michel Ancel terug om Rayman nieuw leven in te blazen. Dit videogame-icoon gaat nog steeds zonder ledematen door het leven, maar dankzij de innovatieve bedieningsmogelijkheden van de Wii beschikt hij nu wél over tal van stoere nieuwe moves. Raving Rabbids belooft het mafste Rayman-avontuur ooit te worden. In de game wordt onze heldhaftige hoofdrolspeler gevangen genomen door een bende dolle konijnen, die al eeuwenlang onder de grond zitten te broeden op een invasie om de wereld te veroveren. Om zijn land en de bewoners ervan te redden, moet Rayman proberen de Rabbids aan zijn kant te krijgen, zodat hij de snode plannen van hun gestoorde keizer kan verijdelen.

NZ.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
NZ.description: Fresh from his work on King Kong, acclaimed game designer Michel Ancel returns to revive Rayman. The eponymous icon is still lacking limbs, but has gained some funky new moves thanks to a control scheme built around the Wii’s innovative controls. Promising to be the zaniest Rayman adventure yet, Raving Rabbids sees our hapless hero imprisoned by a mad horde of bunnies that have been underground for centuries, plotting an invasion to take over the world. PL.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
PL.description: Fresh from his work on King Kong, acclaimed game designer Michel Ancel returns to revive Rayman. The eponymous icon is still lacking limbs, but has gained some funky new moves thanks to a control scheme built around the Wii’s innovative controls. Promising to be the zaniest Rayman adventure yet, Raving Rabbids sees our hapless hero imprisoned by a mad horde of bunnies that have been underground for centuries, plotting an invasion to take over the world. To save the land and its inhabitants, Rayman will need to get the Rabbids on his side and put an end to the plans of their crazy emperor.

PT.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
PT.description: Pouco depois de ter terminado o seu trabalho em King Kong, o aclamado designer de jogos Michel Ancel regressa para dar nova vida a Rayman. Esta popular personagem continua a não ter braços nem pernas, mas agora, graças aos inovadores controlos proporcionados pela Wii, conta com movimentos novos muito originais. Raving Rabbids promete ser a aventura de Rayman mais excêntrica até à data e nela o nosso herói é aprisionado por uma horda louca de coelhinhos que têm vivido debaixo da terra há séculos, arquitetando um malévolo plano de invasão do mundo. De modo a salvar a terra e os seus habitantes, o Rayman terá de fazer com que os Rabbids passem para o seu lado e impedir este imperador de levar a cabo os seus planos.

RU.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
RU.description: Закончив работу над «Кинг-Конгом», знаменитый геймдизайнер Мишель Ансель возвращается к серии игр Rayman. У титульного героя, Рэймана, по-прежнему отсутствуют конечности, но это не помешало ему освоить новые приемы, основанные на инновационном управлении Wii. Игра Raving Rabbids станет самой сумасшедшей в серии Rayman. Нашему незадачливому главному герою не повезло, и он оказался в лапах безумных кроликов, которые сотни лет провели под землей, вынашивая планы по захвату миру. Чтобы предотвратить глобальную катастрофу и сорвать коварные планы ушастого императора, Рэйману предстоит заручиться поддержкой кроликов Rabbids.

SE.name: Rayman® Raving Rabbids
SE.description: Fresh from his work on King Kong, acclaimed game designer Michel Ancel returns to revive Rayman. The eponymous icon is still lacking limbs, but has gained some funky new moves thanks to a control scheme built around the Wii’s innovative controls.
